Uses of Package
com.telenav.kivakit.validation

Packages that use com.telenav.kivakit.validation
Package
Description
com.telenav.kivakit.validation
 
com.telenav.kivakit.validation.types
 
com.telenav.kivakit.validation.validators
 
  • Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.validation used by com.telenav.kivakit.validation
    Class
    Description
    Validatable
    An object that is Validatable can create a Validator for a given type of validation, represented by ValidationType.
    ValidationIssues
    A MessageList and MessageCounter that captures validation issues.
    ValidationType
    A kind of validation as restricted to a particular set of Validatable types.
    Validator
    When Validator.validate(Listener) is called, a Validator validates itself, using the listener parameter to send messages like Problem s and Warnings as validation proceeds.
  • Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.validation used by com.telenav.kivakit.validation.types
    Class
    Description
    Validatable
    An object that is Validatable can create a Validator for a given type of validation, represented by ValidationType.
    ValidationType
    A kind of validation as restricted to a particular set of Validatable types.
  • Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.validation used by com.telenav.kivakit.validation.validators
    Class
    Description
    BaseValidator
    A base implementation of Validator that provides convenience methods for reporting validation issues:
    Validator
    When Validator.validate(Listener) is called, a Validator validates itself, using the listener parameter to send messages like Problem s and Warnings as validation proceeds.
